tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE WeatherData (
  city_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  temperature FLOAT,
  humidity FLOAT,
  rainfall FLOAT,
  planting_time TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE weather_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    temperature FLOAT,
    precipitation FLOAT
) 
CREATE TABLE planting_times (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    plant_name VARCHAR(50),
    optimal_season VARCHAR(50),
    planting_date DATE
)
CREATE TABLE plant_growth (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    plant_name VARCHAR(50),
    growth_rate FLOAT,
    harvest_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE weather_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    date DATE,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE planting_schedule (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    plant_name VARCHAR(255),
    optimal_temperature FLOAT,
    optimal_humidity FLOAT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE plant_types (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    plant_name VARCHAR(255),
    plant_family VARCHAR(255),
    plant_variety VARCHAR(255),
    growth_period VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE weather_forecast (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    temperature_prediction FLOAT,
    humidity_prediction FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE planting_schedule ( 
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    plant_name VARCHAR(50), 
    optimal_temperature FLOAT, 
    optimal_humidity FLOAT, 
    planting_date TIMESTAMP, 
    harvest_date TIMESTAMP 
);
